file_content.text: We see you cower together like fearful animals. And you die like them.
Only our opponents have been dying this day.
That's hardly likely.
If I die, it will be at the hand of someone vastly more important than you.
Wrong.
If you think I'm afraid, you have a lot to learn about body language.
You're deluded.
Just had to get that across before pulling a trigger, huh?
That's a pretty weak threat.
Our champion comes this way. He is the slayer of Sith.
I see you haven't been briefed on our track record.
We've killed dozens of Talz.
You know nothing! Our champion, the slayer of Sith, comes this way. He shows you pain.
You are a slave serving evil masters, strange one. The Empire cares nothing for non-humans.
Better to kneel before a tyrant than vanish with the vanquished.
I've picked my side.
The Empire fears me--a far more reliable standard.
It makes no difference.
That's the great thing about employment. They don't have to care.
Slaves aren't paid.
The Empire cares for its assets. As long as I am one, I've got no complaints.
I'm an exception.
Even if we fall, two-eyes, you are wasted meat. Our champion comes this way. He seeks blood.
Your pathetic gargling only displays your ignorance.
What would you know?
It is I who know more than you. Our champion, the slayer of Sith, heads this way, and a battalion could not stop him.
You choose the wrong side, human. The Empire must be driven off Hoth.
I stand between you and your victory. One you will never claim.
Not today, it won't.
Save your feeble attempts at recruitment for your own planet. This one is mine.
Not if I stop you.
I hear you talk. I don't see you fight.
By you? Not likely.
Uh-huh. Show me a battle plan or shut up and fight.
According to whom?
You do not know how many of us you face. And you do not fight our champion, slayer of Sith.
I don't listen to anyone who plants bombs in my power station.
You're not convincing.
You are blind to the truth. Your Empire is a crumbling house. And our champion comes to knock it down.
I've been waiting to end you.
Us, perhaps. But you do not stand against our champion, the slayer of Sith. His claws taste your blood.
You die in failure, like your Colonel Vannis!
